MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA4 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Barley Road, Pelham Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.27am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1.30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.45am on 13th April 2021.
